name: @tacc/core-styles
author: TACC ACI WMA <wma-portals@gmail.com>
description: CSS source and processor for TACC Core-CMS and Core-Portal.

scripts.test: node src/cli.js build -i "src/lib/_tests" -o "./dist" -m "src/lib" && echo "Test output at 'dist/_tests' (compare to test input)"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build # && npm test && npm run lint

// dependencies.node-cmd: To run PostCSS CLI from script
// dependencies.postcss-banner: To prepend preserved comment to built stylesheets
// dependencies.postcss-cli: To process CSS (the simplest and cheapest PostCSS runner)
// dependencies.postcss-import: To import CSS files at build-time
// dependencies.postcss-extend: To extend CSS rule sets at build-time
// dependencies.postcss-preset-env: To use future CSS features now
